347b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas sdig pa thams cad dral bar bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje pad+ma la bzlas par bya ba'i sngags bsams la/ de nyid yid la zlos shing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas sngar gyi cho ga rnams rjes
347b7(rgyud 'grel): su spyad la/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' thams cad dang mnyam pa'i rang gi snying ga'i zla bar yid kyis nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas zhugs la rdo rje 'khor lo'i
348a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas rang gi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings te 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi spyi bor me tog dor bar bya'o/ /de nas dngos grub kyi brtul shugs blang ba'i bar gyi cho ga rnams rjes su spyad la
348a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor de rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i nang du tshud par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi lus la bcug la dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rab tu bsgrubs nas/ chos dang
348a3(rgyud 'grel): las dang/ phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab la/ 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la/ snga ma bzhin du dang po'i rdo rjes bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas yi ge brgya pas
348a4(rgyud 'grel): brtan par byas la snga ma bzhin du dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blang ba'i bar gyi cho ga rnams rjes su spyad par bya'o/ /de nas pad+ma'i mtshon cha ma la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid mchod la pad+ma chen po
348a5(rgyud 'grel): bcings te/ bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du phyag byas nas phyag bzhi bya'o/ /de nas de kho na nyid dang/ chos dang dam tshig bzung nas bzlas pa bya ba'i sngags lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de nas oM badzra At+ma ko haM zhes brjod de lha
348a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsam par bya'o/ /oM sarba shud+d+ho haM zhes brjod do/ /gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs shing stong pa'i rang bzhin can du bsam par bya'o/ /oM sarba sa mo haM zhes brjod de
348a7(rgyud 'grel): chos bdag med pa'i ye shes las 'byung ba'i lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin bdag yin par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje pad+ma'i dbus su/ ya tha rak+ta mi daM pad maM/ rA ga ho she na li bya ste/ ba sha do
348b1(rgyud 'grel): she shA bi bI d+he/ ta thA shud+ha ma ti d+hA tu gaM zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la/ chos kyis dam tshig gis bzlas shing bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad sngags re re zhing bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o/ /de ltar byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas
348b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /yang na rang gi snying gar rdo rje 'khor los dkyil 'khor sprul la/ 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la sogs pa nas pad+ma'i dril bu ma'i bar du rang gi snying pos bkod la/ snga ma bzhin du snying po gsum brjod cing don gsum bsgoms
348b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ bdag ni rang nyid 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin no zhes rnam par bsams la/ ya tha rak+ta mi daM pad maM zhes bya ba'i sngags lha thams cad kyis thugs ka gnas pa'i rdo rje pad+ma bkod de/ chos kyis tshig gis zlos shing ji
348b4(rgyud 'grel): srid bsgom pa'i dus su nyin re zhing mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o/ /de lta bus ni sngon du bsnyen pa shin tu yang byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas zhag bdun gyi bar du dkyil 'khor 'di'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom
348b5(rgyud 'grel): pa nas brtsams te bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'di kun tu bri'o/ /de la dang por re zhig yo byad thams cad dang ldan pas mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis sbyor ba byas la/ rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs
348b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rang gi lus la bkod de/ mi dus kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg gis dkyil 'khor gyis bgegs bzlog la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis gdon dang slob ma rnams zhi bar bya'o/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du yang dag par sbyang ba'i cho ga dang sa yongs su gzung
348b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i cho ga rjes su spyad la/ dkyil 'khor gyis sa'i dbus su 'dug ste/ rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i khro bos snyoms par zhugs pa las langs nas bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas la/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang/
349a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon dang/ las thams cad pa'i chu snod la sngags yongs su bzlas te/ rdo rje 'khor los 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor mdun du sprul la/ phyag btsal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sdom
349a2(rgyud 'grel): pa gzung ba byas la snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la/ de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la de kho na nyid dang/ chos dang/ dam tshig bzung ba nas snga ma bzhin du ri rab bskyed la/ ri rab kyi steng du rdo rje 'khor los
349a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ bdag nyid spro ba bskyed pa la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad byas nas lus thams cad kyis phyag byas la/ ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom
349a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la de'i snying po bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog
349a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad du gsol zhes bya bas bdag nyid la gsol ba btab par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang/ ya tha rak+ta mi daM pad maM/ rA ga ho she nA li b+hya ste/ bA sa do she shA bi bI de ta thA shud+d+haM ti d+hA tu kA ma/ badzra
349a6(rgyud 'grel): tiSh+Tha maN+Da la u thA pa yA zhes brjod la dkyil 'khor bteg ste bar snang gi phyogs su bzhag la rang gi sngags dang/ rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas snying ga dang dpral ba dang lkog mar bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la/
349a7(rgyud 'grel): yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te/ badzra driSh+Ti maT ces bya ba mig gnyis su bkang la ya zhes bya bas rang gi rkang mthil gnyis su sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la/ rkang mthil gnyis gnon pa'i ri rab nas brtsams te/ sa
349b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhi'i gtan pa la thug pa'i bar gyi sa phyogs thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin can du byas te/ phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs/ /kun tu rnam par bltas nas ni/ /snying po kun tu zlos byed cing/ /bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs
349b2(rgyud 'grel): su bskor/ /rdo rje blta bas kyang phyogs dang mtshams dang/ nam mkha' dang/ 'og dang/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang ra ba dang dra ba bya'o/ /yang rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i snyoms par zhugs pas langs la bgegs gzhom pa
349b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor ni sgo bzhi phye la gsang ba'i gzugs can gyi dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du spyan drangs nas snga ma bzhin du phur bu gdab par bya'o/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas la slob ma
349b4(rgyud 'grel): la lhag par gnas pa dang/ lha lhag par gnas pa bya'o/ /de nas nyi ma gnyis pa la mal nas langs la snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas nas yang dkyil 'khor thams cad snga ma bzhin du bteg ste/
349b5(rgyud 'grel): bar snang gi phyogs su snga ma bzhin du thig gdab pa'i sngags dang/ tshon sna lnga'i srad bu la bdag po lnga yongs su blangs la/ nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor dris byug cing me tog bsil ma bkram pa byas
349b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ dza las mig g.yon dang g.yas su zla ba dang nyi ma ser po snang ba bskyed nas/ oM hUM traM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): a zhes zlos shing rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje pad+ma las sgrub pa'i grogs mchog pad+ma'i gar gyi dbang phyug gi gzugs
349b7(rgyud 'grel): su yid kyis phyung la/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis tshon sna lnga'i skud pa blangs la dang po sngags kyi sbyangs shing dri dang bcas pa'i tshon dkar po'i nang du spangs la dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas srad bu grogs po'i lag tu btang
350a1(rgyud 'grel): la snga ma bzhin du phyi'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su snga ma bzhin du ka ba brgyad kyi tshul gyis pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa pad+ma'i phreng bas bskor bas thig btab la tshon sna lnga'i phye mas phyis
350a2(rgyud 'grel): dang nang gi dkyil 'khor thams cad snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar sna tshogs pad+ma la 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku lugs ma 'am/ brkos pa 'am/ bris pa sku mdog gser btso ma 'ang?
350a3(rgyud 'grel): ba/ phyag g.yon pa pad+ma'i khu tshur gyis pad+ma bsnams shing dkur brten nas de la gzigs pa'i tshul gyis phyag g.yas pas mthe bong dang de'i mdzub mos de'i 'dam phye ba mdzad pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis spras pa/ pad+ma'i  
350a4(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i cod pan dang/ dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba 'dzum pas gzigs pa sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa rang gi snying po
350a5(rgyud 'grel): dgod par bya'o/ /de'i mdun du 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i gnas shar gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis ting nge 'dzin bzang po zhes bya bas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs can sna tshogs pad+ma la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag
350a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas rdo rje pad+ma bsnams shing ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de'i g.yas logs kI li kI la'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma chen po zhes bya ba thugs ka'i phyogs su pad+ma'i khu tshur gnyis kyi rdo rje
350a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma gnyis bsnams nas bzhugs pa'o/ /de'i rgyab tu rdo rje dran ma'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba phyag g.yon pas rdo rje pad+ma bsnams shing ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs pa'o/ /de'i
350b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon logs su rdo rje bsnyems ma'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi tshul can pad+ma'i khu tshur gnyis kyis rin po che pad+ma stsol ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad
350b2(rgyud 'grel): yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i sbyor bas bzhugs shing/ sna tshogs pad+ma la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs sna pa'o/ /'di dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dzin par bri bar bya'o/ /de yang yongs su 'jig rten dbang
350b3(rgyud 'grel): phyug gzugs/ /sangs rgyas la sogs ? kyi lha zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM badzra pad+ma ma he pad+ma pad+ma baM ho(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma ma no rA dza zhes bya ba yin no/ /yang dkyil 'khor 'di
350b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi rdo rje sbrang rtsi ma'i gnas su 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa lha chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ sku mdog dkar po phyag bzhi /phyag g.yas pa gnyis kyis rtse gsum 'chang zhing mchog stsol ba/ g.yon gnyis kyis zhags
350b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang pad+ma bsnams pa/ bden bral gyi mtshams su khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog nag po /phyag g.yas gnyis na 'khor lo dang dbyug pa bsnams pa/ g.yon gnyis na ba dan dang dung bsnams pa/ rlung
350b6(rgyud 'grel): gi mtshams su 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs pa'i gzugs can sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi dang phyag bzhi mnga' ba/ g.yas gnyis na phreng ba dang dbyug pa bsnams pa/ g.yon gnyis na pad+ma dang spyi blugs bsnams
350b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi mtshams su 'jig rten dbang byug 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa zhal gnyis pa/ de la phyag g.yas gnyis kyi mda' dang lcags kyu bsnams pa/ g.yon gnyis kyi gzhu dang pad+ma bsnams pa'o/
351a1(rgyud 'grel): zhal dang po ni 'dod pa'i lha'i gdong 'dra ba spyi bo na rta mgo ljang gu'i mgrin pa bteg ste 'chor bar byed pa'i tshul can no/ /de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni hUM pad+ma badzra na ade she shwa ra hUM phaT/ he ma he pad+ma bi
351a2(rgyud 'grel): shwa mu rti sid+d+hya hUM phaT/ hi pad+ma pad+ma hUM a(rgyud 'grel): ho pad+ma a sha a kra ma hUM dza zhes bya'o/ /sgeg mo la sogs pa nas pad+ma'i dril bu mi 'bar ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i snying po nyid kyis
351a3(rgyud 'grel): dgod par bya'o/ /'dir khyad par ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste phyag mtshan rnams pad+mas mtshan pa yin no/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas phyi rol tu snga ma bzhin du rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis sbyor bas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo phye la/ de
351a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du thams cad byas nas bsdu ba bya'o/ /de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod la spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya dril bu dang bcas pa'i sngags 'dis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad spyan drangs la dkyil
351a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du gzhug par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te shwa ra pad+ma ha sta a ya ti shI g+hAM/ e me badzra mu tra ba tre d+hA ki Sh+ya sa ma ye bad+d+ha ba shi ka ro mi ta dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sho d+ha ya sarba sid tha ya pad+maM mahA dza da ra sum
351a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bshad par bya ste/ rdo rje bsdams ba bcings la mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs te/ lcags kyur byas la mthe chung gnyis shin tu brkyang ba ni rgod ma'i kha gdangs pa zhes bya ba yin te/ ka bskyod pa'i
351a7(rgyud 'grel): tshul du bya ba 'di ni pad+ma lcags kyu zhes bya ste/ 'dis mdzub mo gnyis kyis spyan drang bar bya'o/ /de nas pad+ma'i gnod sbyin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bgegs skrad pa la sogs pa byas la/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo rnams
351b1(rgyud 'grel): bcad de/ rdo rje bsrung bas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs la tshigs su bcad pa dang/ sngags kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon phul nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor
351b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa bsgrub par bya'o/ /des chos dang las dang/ phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab la/ oM badzra d+harma a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbang
351b3(rgyud 'grel): bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas mchod yon phul la bum pa la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa rnams dang/ pad+ma'i mtshon cha la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod la/ pad+ma chen po me tog dang
351b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa bcings la/ yid ma yengs par oM pad+ma su laM zhes bya ba zlos shing phyag bya'o/ /de nas phyag bzhi byas nas phyi rol tu gtor ma la sogs sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas pad+ma'i gnod sbyin dang/ rdo rje me dang/ na bza' dkar
351b5(rgyud 'grel): mos sbyin sreg gis cho gas sbyin sreg byas la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis dbus su bcom ldan 'das me tog gis mchod la bzhugs su gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags kyis mar gyis sbyin
351b6(rgyud 'grel): sreg brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin bzang po la sogs pa la ni rang gi snying pos skyin sreg bdun bdun dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas yang lha thams cad kyi snying po zlos shing me tog gi dkyil 'khor de bri ba'i dkyil 'khor
351b7(rgyud 'grel): dang lhan cig tu gcig tu bya'o/ /de nas phyag bya ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa blangs la/ de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed nas/ su ra te sa ma yastwaM ho badzra sid+d+ha d+hya ya su khaM zhes bya ba dang/ pad+ma'i khu tshur
352a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis rdo rje pad+ma blangs la rang gi snying gar bzhag ste/ rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje pad+ma bskyed nas shar phyogs kyi sgor bltas te phyi rol na gnas bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la/ rdo rje thal mo khong stong gi gung
352a2(rgyud 'grel): mo dang/ mthe bor mthe chung kha phye la 'dab ma bzhi pa me tog dang bcas pa bcing bar bya'o/ /da nas des me tog gi phreng ba blangs la 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa blangs la rdo rje shugs kyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o/ /de ni 'di
352a3(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ kra tsid a tI ro de ta nu u gra dzI na su ha ri ma/ pra pa dya si ka bid+d+ha tISh+Tha tsa kra d+ha ra mu rti sa man+ta A gats+tsha bi ni ya daM/ kri tsit+ta ni/ so nya shAn+ta pa bu ra/ ka ra daM ka mi la sa ni sya pe/ kri tsit+te di bat+te/ kA ma sa ma yaM pra sid+d+hya ma hA pad+ma
352a4(rgyud 'grel): ra dza ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba dang pad+ma'i lcags kyu ma zlos shing 'jug par bya'o/ /yang lho phyogs kyi sgo nas pad+ma'i zhags pa ma'i snying po zlos shing 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas nub phyogs kyi sgo nas pad+ma'i lcags sgrog ma'i
352a5(rgyud 'grel): snying po zlos shing 'jug par bya'o/ /yang byang phyogs kyi sgo nas pad+ma dril bu ma'i snying po zlos shing 'jug par bya'o/ /yang shar phyogs kyis sgo nas zhugs la yid kyis ma yengs par phyag bya'o/ /de nas de'i 'og tu
352a6(rgyud 'grel): oM baM she d+ha ya tsi t+taM me sarba d+harme sh+ya badzra Ni zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /'dod chags
352a7(rgyud 'grel): chen po bde ba che/ /rdo rje chen po nor che ba/ /ye shes chen po las che ba/ /rdo rje sems thogs bdag grub mdzod/ /yang 'di skad ces brjod do/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): bra sid+d+hye maM/ de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la bdag nyid la
352b1(rgyud 'grel): dbab par bya'o/ /dang por re zhig sa ma yastwaM zhes brjod de/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ngo/ /de nas oM pad+ma sa ye ta a tiSh+Tha a zhes zlos shing sems ma rdo rje ma'i sbyor ba byas nas a zhes bya ba lan brgya bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas
352b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug gi snying po lan brgya bzlas nas dbab bar bya'o/ /de nas 'jig rten dbang phyug gi snying pos me tog dor ro/ /de nas de blangs la de nyid kyis rang gi mgo la brjod par bya'o/ /de nas de nyid kyis gdong
352b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yogs dgrol lo/ /de nas de nyid zlos shing shar phyogs nas brtsams te/ dkyil 'khor blta bar bya'o/ /de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ tiSh+Tha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi snying gar dkrol lo/
352b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la bde bas bzhin ras rang bzhin yid tsam 'dzum pa'i ye shes kyis rdo rje blangs pas bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing mchu mnyam par bzhag ste/ ji srid bcom ldan
352b5(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyis mthong ba stsal nas rang gi dngos grub stsol bar mdzad pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor bar shis pa brjod pa'i tshul du rang gi snying gar bzhag ste/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis
352b6(rgyud 'grel): bstod nas pad+ma'i mtshon cha la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par mchod la glu dang rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pas kyang legs par mchod par bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid la
352b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad snga ma bzhin du rjes su spyad par bya'o/ /slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //de nas slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga bshad par byas te/ rdo rje
353a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon bskor bcings na/ /snying nas bsam yas bzhin gyis ni/ /mgo bos legs par phyag byas na/ /dngos grub thams cad rab grub byed/ /zhugs nas dkyil 'khor lan gsum ni/ /
353a2(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba byas te 'di brjod bya/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /'gro ba kun kyang 'grub par mdzod/ /de nas dus kyis mchod pa yis/ /bde ba chen po yang dag mchod/ /de bzhin pad+ma'i dbang bskur zhing/ /slob ma blangs
353a3(rgyud 'grel): te 'jug par bya/ /de nas slob ma bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su bzung ba 'am/ dge tshul lam dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su bzung ba/ rig pa'i sdom pa don du gnyer bas slob dpon la phyag byas la 'di skad ces brjod
